name: Dokk1
description: The courts by the sea are known to be the most popular place to play street football in Aarhus. Both the northern and southern courts are equipped with tall, long nets, that prevent the ball from falling in the water. Its proximity to the university’s Navitas building and the library Dokk1, makes these courts the ideal exercising spots for students.

name: Frederiksbjerg
description: The court at Frederiksbjerg is the most well lit court in Aarhus. It is ideal for street football during fall and winter. The court is located by the ASA Football Club and there is a swimming pool right next to it. With its unique arquitecture and graffiti art, the court at Frederiksbjerg is certainly the most unique court in town.

name: Grønnegade
description: At the end of Grønnegade, hidden behind two tall aparment buildings, is the legendary Grønnegade Stadium. It is the home to the current greatest group of street footballers in Aarhus. God only knows how many more legendary matches will be held at Grønnegade. It is the most beautiful court in Aarhus.
